column2: Core attributes, id, lang, tabindex, xml:base, xml:lang, xml:space
Filter primitive attributes, height, result, width, x, y
column3: Transfer function attributes, type, tableValues, slope, intercept, amplitude, exponent, offset

column5: Animation value attributes, calcMode, values, keyTimes, keySplines, from, to, by, autoReverse, accelerate, decelerate
